description.narrative: For Association Malienne Pour la Promotion Economique et Sociale (Malian Association for Economic and Social Promotion) (AMPES) aims to raise awareness among several communities about the causes and effects of climate change, thereby helping these communities to preserve their environment. Climate change has had severe impacts on fauna, flora, water sources, as well as on the entire economic life of several communities in Diema, most notably on vital sectors such as agriculture, livestock herding, and fishing. The organization strives to explain the causes and manifestations of climate change to the Circle of Diema and to identify adaptation and mitigation strategies. The group urges communities to organize in order to deal with environmental changes in a stronger, unified way, and to exchange experiences. The organization's principal activity will be information workshop about climate change in Diema. Around 18, 865 men, and 19,635 women will be involved
